QuestData.Title: Stow and Go
QuestData.Description:
<Flynn lifts his collar to hide his face and speaks to you under his breath.>
You see that ship? I know that ship.
Let's just say her captain and I have a little history.
It's a smuggling vessel. Our illegal weapons are on there for sure. I'd bet my coat on it... and I love this coat.
We need to find out where it's going...
How are you in tight spaces?
QuestData.LogDescription: Stow away on The Maiden's Virtue.
QuestData.RewardText: You alright, mate? I'm afraid your ship's gone.$B$BSomethin' tells me you weren't really a part o' that crew anyway, were ya? Har har!
